content: Prepare for dense fog in part of Pennsylvania until Wednesday morning: A report from the National Weather Service was issued on Wednesday at 3:12 a.m. for dense fog until 9 a.m. for Northern Clinton, Northern Centre, Southern Centre, Northern Lycoming, Southern Clinton and Southern Lycoming as well as Potter, Blair, Huntingdon, Bedford, Fulton, Franklin, Tioga, Sullivan, Union, Snyder, Montour, Northumberland, Columbia, Perry, Dauphin, Lebanon, Cumberland, Adams, York and Lancaster counties.
